title: So just had an abusive guy who made threats
body: Just curious what should I do now? i did report him in game but it wasn't just verbal abuse they were death threats and really morbid... is naming and shaming fine now? or should I just send a ticket to support with screenshots or both?

replies.body: You should cower in fear, arrive to your local police station and start crying in hysterics.

Naming and shaming isn't acceptable under any circumstances. You can send a ticket to support via the website but you'll likely not get anything more than reporting them in the post-game lobby. If you feel more is needed you could probably get into contact with the police about it and sort something out with them.
Why is naming and shaming not allowed?
Mainly it's because Riot doesn't want people going on "witch hunts" because someone was complaining on the boards.
